Class LevelInfo

public class LevelInfo
extends java.lang.Object

Class for storing all of the different level information.

Method Detail

findTile

public int[] findTile(int coordX,
                      int coordY)
Gets what tile given coordinates belong to.

Parameters:
coordX - the X coordinate.
coordY - the Y coordinate.
Returns:
Integer array of 2 elements, where the first element is the X coordinate tile, the second - Y coordinate tile.

getLevel

public int[][] getLevel()
Gets the current level layout

Returns:
2D matrix of Integers ranging from 0 to 2, where 0 is a wall, 1 - pallet, 2 - energy orb.

getX

public int getX(int tileX)
Gets the X coordinate of given tile.

Parameters:
tileX - Integer of tile.
Returns:
Integer which represents the X coordinate.

getY

public int getY(int tileY)
Gets the Y coordinate of given tile.

Parameters:
tileY - Integer of tile.
Returns:
Integer which represents the Y coordinate.

legalMove

public int legalMove(int tileX,
                     int tileY)
Gets if a move is legal (not a wall and not out of bounds).

Parameters:
tileX - the X coordinate tile.
tileY - the Y coordinate tile.
Returns:
Integer >0 if legal, 0 if illegal.
